comment.author: 63032059@N04
comment._content: Until we visited Lord Bledisloe's home at Lydney in Gloucestershire some years ago now we did not know he was connected to New Zealand, Tasmania and the Rugby  Cup series between NZ and Australia!!  There are lovely gardens at his former home in Lydney.

comment.author: 85888836@N03
comment._content: Milford is not part of Auckland in the North Island.  It is as the photo description says part of the Milford /Sound on the west coast of the South Island.

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Thank you for your feedback. I have corrected the location description accordingly
